parameters.name: FLUX
parameters.description: [FLUX] Proton number flux, 15 energy channels populated approximately 0.4-3 keV [spectrogram]

parameters.name: ENERGY
parameters.description: ---> Time-variable energy in each of 15 channels

parameters.name: MOM.P.SC_CURRENT
parameters.description: [P.SC_CURRENT?] Current contribution to the spacecraft from thermal protons

parameters.name: MOM.P.MAGF
parameters.description: ---> [P.MAGF] magnetic field vector interpolated (linearly) to the time of the PESA Low distribution, in GSE cartesian components

parameters.name: MOM.P.FLUX
parameters.description: ---> [P.FLUX] Proton total number flux - cartesian GSE

parameters.name: MOM.P.PTENS
parameters.description: [P.PTENS] Proton Pressure Tensor calculated in the GSE coordinate basis.  The elements correspond to, in the following order: XX, YY, ZZ, XY, XZ, YZ

parameters.name: MOM.P.MFTENS
parameters.description: ---> [P.MFTENS] Proton Momentum Flux Tensor calculated in the GSE coordinate basis.  The elements correspond to, in the following order: XX, YY, ZZ, XY, XZ, YZ

parameters.name: MOM.P.T3
parameters.description: ---> [P.T3] Proton Temperature eigenvalues after diagonalization of tensor, calculated in the GSE coordinate basis.  The elements correspond to:  XX, YY, ZZ

parameters.name: MOM.P.SYMM
parameters.description: [P.SYMM] Symmetry direction of proton pressure tensor, calculated in the GSE coordinate basis.  The elements correspond to:  XX, YY, ZZ and are defined by the largest eigenvalue in .T3

parameters.name: MOM.P.SYMM_ANG
parameters.description: ---> [P.SYMM_ANG] Angle between proton symmetry direction and the magnetic field vector

parameters.name: MOM.P.MAGT3
parameters.description: ---> [P.SYMM_MAGT3] Proton temperature tensor... rotated into a field-aligned coordinate basis and then taking the diagonal elements only

parameters.name: MOM.P.ERANGE
parameters.description: [P.ERANGE] Proton energy range used to compute the moments

parameters.name: MOM.A.SC_CURRENT
parameters.description: [A.SC_CURRENT]  Current contribution to the spacecraft from thermal alphas

parameters.name: MOM.A.MAGF
parameters.description: ---> [A.MAGF] magnetic field vector interpolated (linearly) to the time of the PESA Low distribution, in GSE cartesian components

parameters.name: MOM.A.FLUX
parameters.description: ---> [P.FLUX] Alpha total number flux - cartesian GSE

parameters.name: MOM.A.PTENS
parameters.description: [A.PTENS] Alpha Pressure Tensor calculated in the GSE coordinate basis.  The elements correspond to, in the following order: XX, YY, ZZ, XY, XZ, YZ

parameters.name: MOM.A.MFTENS
parameters.description: ---> [A.MFTENS] Alpha Momentum Flux Tensor calculated in the GSE coordinate basis.  The elements correspond to, in the following order: XX, YY, ZZ, XY, XZ, YZ

parameters.name: MOM.A.T3
parameters.description: ---> [A.T3] Alpha Temperature eigenvalues after diagonalization of tensor, calculated in the GSE coordinate basis.  The elements correspond to:  XX, YY, ZZ

parameters.name: MOM.A.SYMM
parameters.description: [A.SYMM] Symmetry direction of alpha pressure tensor, calculated in the GSE coordinate basis.  The elements correspond to:  XX, YY, ZZ and are defined by the largest eigenvalue in .T3

parameters.name: MOM.A.SYMM_ANG
parameters.description: ---> [A.SYMM_ANG] Angle between alpha symmetry direction and magnetic field vector

parameters.name: MOM.A.MAGT3
parameters.description: ---> [A.SYMM_MAGT3] Alpha temperature tensor... rotated into a field-aligned coordinate basis and then taking the diagonal elements only

parameters.name: MOM.A.ERANGE
parameters.description: [A.ERANGE] Alpha energy range used to compute the moments
